atk-abh03a45:15_13: Yaṁ pana vibhaṅgappakaraṇassa sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ sattarasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṁ,
